reviews.text: We had a wonderful dining experience at this restaurant. The food was fresh, with a great variety of ingredients to choose from, and the broth was flavorful even after several top up on the soup. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, making sure we had everything we needed without being intrusive. What I appreciated most was the peaceful atmosphere‚Äîit wasn‚Äôt overly crowded or noisy, allowing for a relaxing meal. If you‚Äôre looking for a good steamboat place with great service and a quiet environment, this is definitely worth a visit! Overall it cost RM189 for this wonderful meal. It‚Äôs worth it. Will return again.

If you looking for a Herbal Chicken & Pork Maw Hot Pot soup, this is the place you must visit. Super delicious & yummy, value for money. üòã
Have been here many many times when in JB, especially raining day.
Free ice cream "Potong" as well, must come & try sure not regret üòâ

This is my 3rd time eating here. I can vouch for the chicken soup. In fact Ah Pei, a nice lady, recommended that we drink the soup first before we put ingredients into the hot pot. Needless to say, this time , we ordered 5 plates of pig stomach üòÇ.  So shiok.  Will be back end of June with more friends üí™

When I show this "guo ba" to the girl waiter. She said no problem all is like this and taste nice mix with rice.  But this dark rice is burnt smell, she said other place not like this but their shop all is like this and taste very good. Ask my family and I must try. As human sense this is unhealthy things so we don't eat. When we went out. I saw other table is not like this, feel ery disappointed with this service and feedback üòî
